scripts.start: concurrently "cd host; npm run dev" "cd remote; npm run dev"
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm run start & sleep 10 && npx cypress run --config-file ../../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/runAll.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
